npc.name: 匠人のドゥザル・メイェアン

lines: Crafter, featherless one is? Caw! Good things, I hear, of featherless ones' crafting, but perfection, I demand. Pass my inspections, you shall, or peck out your eyes, I will. Caw!
Caw! Honored, I am, to have featherless one work on Dezul Qualan. A new standard of excellence, you have set, for the crafters here at Ehcatl. Jealous, they may be, but learn a great deal, they will.

obj.n: 翼を広げ、何よりも高く
